Woman-devil: I thought you wanted be close to the ocean, the present refuge of mine and Beatrix.

Beatrix: We had such thought that if you can not come to be in our living place then it implies that you would like to come to be near it.

Judy: Ok. Lets do so.

Woman-devil: I will tell you about me and our life on the way. But I must warn you that you, may be will understand not everything clearly. But do not be distressed if it is so. Now I am answering your last question. You asked how my magic forces are related with strength of the fencing. So I am explaining you, but at first I must say that it may be very puzzling for you. You as a human may not understand much. I hope you will be satisfied by the information which you will get from me. Well, what is related with my forces and this lattce - both are related in reality. Forces like mine let make buildings very buxom. They can influence phisical laws and as a result my buildings under my own intention. I am an embodiment from the hereafter. So I can do very much. There is no disparity from my view-point. You were right when you talked about my omnipotence, because I am not a simple human. I am a devil in human female imagery from the hereafter. I have a very grander mission in this world and it is for favor for your universe with life planet.

Beatrix: Judy knows that it is for favor for this world. I remember I, Judy and her friend talked about it. I remember I talked about it with Judy's friend in whose aquarium I lived. I think all her  friends know about it now

Woman-devil: What else do you want hear about?

Judy: My friend Helen whose pet Beatrix was for some time told about one abstract catastrophy alluding to Beatrix's words. What catastrophe is this?

Woman-devil: Do not worry. It is completely not your problem. Only I and, of course, my creatures which are called, as you see, extra-decomposers are responsible for this.

Judy: But what was this?

Woman-devil: People who live near the ocean in which I and Beatrix live now, do not have clear conscience and do not strive to endorse cleaness. So nature in the ocean and on its banks is contaminated very seriously. So my extra-decomposers work for refinement it.

Judy: May I ask why you have been living during whole your life in the ocean, not out of it somewhere on land?

Woman-devil: I have already known that people do not like me very much.

Author's words: The horse is hastening. Judy feels shiver.

Judy: What are we doing?

Woman-devil: We are hasting, as you see. Now we are going to fly more quickly. I have explained what for. What bothers you, Judy?

Judy: Oh, no, Woman-devil, stop it, please! I can't hold! I am going to fall!

Author's words: Woman-devil is stopping the horse. Judy is breathing heavily

Beatrix: So we will have to reach for a very long time. The distance from here to the ocean is very enormous. It is measured in hundreds of kilometers.

Judy: What ocean is it?

Woman-devil: Pacific. The way will be very long if we move with so low speed.

Judy: How much time it takes for you and Beatrix on this horse when you go such distance as from the place of our meeting to the ocean?

Woman-devil: It is the first time when I go such distance. I do not know how much time the trip will take. But I am sure it will be not like a few minutes. It will takes hours.

Judy: But I am afraid so big speed. So, I think, we have to part right now if it is the one way to go to the ocean.

Woman-devil: There are 2 ways, but at the moment there is only one way - on my horse. He begins have wigs like bird wigs after distillation. It can raise and fly with them.

Judy: What is the second way?

Woman-devil: Sometimes I have wigs, too, as I told. I have wigs as if I was a gigantic butterfly. But I make my wigs only after my dreaming through the cocoon like a caterpillar. Current minutes are not my minutes for dream. So now I can not have wigs and bring you and Beatrix to the ocean on my back.

Judy: Then I think it is time to part.

Author's words: At this moment Judy got a thought regarding her riot about Christian. Judy is bothered by his fate in previous life. Maybe Woman-devil is related with Christian's storie in his previous life?

Woman-devil: Yes, Of course, you may go.

Judy: I want ask you another one question.

Woman-devil: I listen you.

Judy: Do you know about my acquaintance Christian? Beatrix wanted them to go to your world and talk with you, but he refused?

Woman-devil: I heard about one human whom Beatrix wanted invite to our meeting in the ocean. But Beatrix did not say his name.

Judy: Probably she meant Christian. He told us his harsh storie and I thought maybe it is related with you.

Woman-devil: What storie?

Judy: At first I have to ask you have you been living in our world for a very long time?

Woman-devil: Yes, I have according to human measurements. I have been living here for many human years. What sharp storie about your acquaintance was this?

Judy: He was a scientist and one night in his life when he carried out his scientific deal in a forest he collided with a mystery creature. It played out very negative role in his life. He could not to continue to engage science so long as he wanted. Now he lives his next life and claims to continue doing science what he could not continue in his previous life. When he told us about this event in his previous life he described the creature which he saw. So I thought, maybe, it was one of your creatures? Can you remember all your creatures, if they are not too much?

Woman-devil: How Christian described the creature?

Judy: It was similar to a monster. But I can not describe it particularly. Sorry. I remember only such facts that it had red burning in darkness eyes and clutches. Christian was daunted with it. So he has abdicated from his engagement and run away from the forest. After that he had tangible troubles in his life. He was taken for a madman.

Woman-devil: So if it was a monster and it was related with me it means it could be only me in monster imaginary. I am very sorry.

Beatrix: May I paste my word, please?

Judy: Of course, you may.

Beatrix: I want you, Lady Devil, to notice that Judy does not want accuse you with offense. But she sincerely regrets about Christian's fate. So she wants find out the reason for this accident. Also she wants this Christian's trouble not to repeat again.

Woman-devil: I understand. I really can take monsters imaginaries at night when I go to forests and dissipate my extra-decomposers there. I did it. But I do not know how looks Christian and I do not remember how looked the people whom I saw in the forests. So I can not remember my meeting with Christian. But you have to transfer Christian from me the information that he may not to worry in the forests. If I being in a monster imaginary see people in a forest I will take not scary imaginary. And if I see that they are daunted I will calm down them. I will try not to allow them go mad.

Judy: So I was very glad to see you, Lady Devil and you, Beatrix, too. I think it is time to say good bye and part.

Beatrix: We were gald, too. Have good and durable impressions.

Woman-devil: It was a splendid meeting. It was next time when I liked my communication with a human. I see again that there are very good people in the world beside different stinkers.

Author's words: Judy is getting down from the horse

Beatrix: I would like you to go to visit us and see multitude of different marine inhabitants. Also we would talk else.

Judy: Sorry, Beatrix. I think it would be interesting, but I am not sure I will have such possibility.

Beatrix: Then I just wish you good luck and long positive impressions.

Woman-devil: From me, too.

Judy: Thank you.

Author's words: Judy is going in direction to home. Woman-devil and Beatrix are flying off on the horse.
There Woman-devil, Beatrix and Lilian are sitting in the bottom of the ocean.

Woman-devil: Beatrix, can you scratch my nails on the legs?

Beatrix: Of course, I can.

Woman-devil: Then move here, please, and do it for me. Today we can talk about your last visit to your onetime host if you want

Author's words: Beatrix is swimming to Woman-devil with a cleaning stone.

Woman-devil: I wish you, Lilian, to be here, too, and to help Beatrix. I wish her to clean my nails on one my leg and you to clean my nails on my other leg.

Lilian: Yes, I understand the request. I am rushing.

Beatrix: Me too.

Woman-devil: You may not rush so much. I can wait while you reach me.

Author's words: Beatrix and Lilian give stones, awim to Woman-devil and begin clean Woman-devil's nails

Beatrix: I think there is nothing especially new. Christian is fond with his engagement as usually. Unfortunately, he did not admit proposal to go here and knew something interesting about the extra-decomposers.

Woman-devil: Did you tell him that the host of the estate is inadequate?

Beatrix: No I did not. I did not prefer to say Christian about it.

Woman-devil: So you were right that you did not dare to do that.

Beatrix: But Christian abdicated from this idea at least.

Woman-devil: It is his own right. If he does not prefer to do what you suggested him than just let him to do  what he prefers to do. How were your last days in the aquarium of your first host where you flied recently?

Beatrix: Good, Lady Devil. I spent these days in the aquarium of my host, communicated with her friends. They all met me with goodwill. We talked about my proposal as you know. Besides I communicated with animals in Helen's aquarium before my communication with the people.

Woman-devil: Do you like marine animals in her aquarium?

Beatrix: Of course, I do. But, frankly, they do not differ tangibly from the animals which I saw in the ocean.

Woman-devil: Are you serious?

Beatrix: Yes, I am serious. I communicated with the animals in the ocean about my life in the swamp. I talked with the animals in Helen's aquarium to the same topic. I told them the same what I told the animals in the ocean. I think both categories of the animals were interested in the same extent.

Woman-devil: It means there is no tangible difference between yourmconversation with the animals of one category and other one. But I have not seen yet any difference between the animals in your narrative. Maybe you wanted say that there is simillarity between them which is that all of them are equally friendly and interested in the same questions regarding to you?

Beatrix: I don't know how to say to be true. I communicated with all of them almost to the same theme. I told them almost the same about myself and my life in the swamp. It is about what I communicated with them. I communicated with them about something completely other not so much.

Woman-devil: I have no doubts that if we talk exactly about the inhabitants and not about something other what may be related with them, for example, what your communication with them. We can notice that many of them are completely different: their view, body structure, nutrition and lifestyle - the difference is very obvious.

Author's words: For some moments there was continuing silence. It was transgressed by the words of Woman-devil:

Woman-devil: But there are some similarities between all the marine animals which differ them from people. Some people are so freaks what I can not say about animals.

Lilian: What summons disturbance regarding people in you?

Woman-devil: Some people are so cruel and relentless being regarding nature! I do not ceasecontaminate nature without a good reason. I find it a quite meaningless and absurd! I do not like it! But, from other side, we have deal on this planet, thanks to this unpleasant fact.

Lilian: Is there a gravity for me regarding the host of these estate?

Woman-devil: You will be in safety if you are under water always.

Author's words: A medusa is swimming towards to Woman-devil.

Woman-devil: I did not summon you here. What do you want from me?

Medusa: I would like know about what you are telling.

Woman-devil: It is not regardless you, trust me.
It is about people who live in the houses on the bank of this lake. They are so blackguard! But I think you will never meet them because you always are in the water and he always are out of it.

Lilian: But I listened that people can swim in water and breathe in there in special hemlets.  Such people are called divers.

Woman-devil: There is an interesting question: what our host 444 has to look for here? I will arrange him a wonderful swimming!

Lilian: I think we must retreat this human! I do not like this fact that he can imbue here.

Woman-devil: I do not like it, too. But I will take measures over this fact.

People who live on the banks of our ocean contributed to its pollution. They use the banks as a dump. There is so much litter and carrion here: waste from different jetsam of these people, corpses of died animals and people!

Lilian: People are a terrific kind of life! It is terrible! How is it possible to contaminatewhen nature when you can escape this?

Medusa: I have literally nothing to spoil live nature.

Woman-devil: Yes, really, people are a terrific life specie. But there is explaination how can they be able  to do what representatives of other species can not do. Human nature is not what is nature of the special marine creature like you.  Besides there is such fact that human life goes on not in the same world where your life goes on, what is a very important  circumstance.

Lilian: You, must be, went to the human world to stop such people as 444?

Woman-devil: Yes, of course. We intend to do this.

Beatrix: How will you stop him?

Woman-devil: I will engage him. I reflected about this question and I have concluded that I can talk with him and propel him to stop beastliness. Maybe you will trust me soon, maybe you will not. Don't worry, please. Anything will be all right.

Beatrix: How will you stop him?

Woman-devil: I will not let him to imbue here too deeply. Moreover there will be no necessarity for him to tamper in this lake according to my purposes. I will talk with him out and very far from this lake

Medusa: You can live out of water and speak with people! It is surprising!

Woman-devil: Of course, I can. Why not? Beatrix and Lilian can, too. But, of course, it is better for them to keep in the lake and not to stick out.

Medusa: I can defense myself through my stinging tentacles!

Woman-devil: You will not have to do this. I will not let 444 to imbue there.

Lilian: Did 444 told you why he has became a scoundrel?

Woman-devil: No, he did not.

Medusa: What storie was this with him?

Woman-devil: Do you mean an event in the result of which he has became such human?

Medusa: Yes. What storie was this with him?

Woman-devil: I don't know for sure.

Lilian: But, may be, there are some hypothesis?

Woman-devil: I will find it out when I talk with him. Also I will not let him to spoil nature. Frankly I have already tired from this beastliness.

Beatrix: We wish you to be successfull.

Woman-devil: Thank you.

Lilian: But it means we loose our urge to refine nature. What will we do if this beastliness finishes?

Woman-devil: Do not worry. We will decide what will you do. You, Lilian, can live without refinement. Beatrix can became a human or somebody like me.

Beatrix: It is wonderful that I can do it!

Woman-devil: You can't, unfortunately. Do not take offense at me, please. But it is true that Beatrix was a human earlier. Now she would like to be a human again. You have never been somebody except a mermaid.
But I think life will not be pious after we complete our mission.

Medusa: I think so. It is enough enthralling in this water space!

Beatrix: So, we are going to terminate our mission and rebuild our life and life purposes?

Woman-devil: Yes, of course. It is not so interesting if it is the same during the whole life.

Beatrix: I am interested about my life in human incarnation at near future. Will I have parents at least adoptive ones?

Woman-devil: I think, you will. We will seek adoptive parents for you. I hope we will find somebody.

Lilian: I wonder if I can live without carrion.

Woman-devil: You can, trust me. But you can not know so much about yourself as me just basing only on your own feelings.

Beatrix: I will miss you, Lady Devil, when I live with adoptive parents.

Woman-devil: I will miss you, too.

Beatrix: Will we have a possibility to meet again someday?

Woman-devil: It is not a very high probability.

Beatrix: Why it isn't?

Woman-devil: Because you and me will have our own lifes. You will have your own life in human incarnation and I will continuemy life as a devil. We will have completely different purposes in our life. So we will not interfere with each other.

Beatrix: Oh, it is so lamentable! You gave me life and I am so obliged to you! I am so thankful to you, Lady Devil! I love you! I love you so much! Do you want to say that you cannot be my adoptive parent?

Woman-devil: Unfortunately, I cannot play this role even according to all my desire. I understand you very well. I love you, too. Parting with you is very sad for me, too. But I want you to understand something. I want you to understand difference between you and me. It is difference between a human and a devil like me. But, unfortunately, I cannot explain you all the difference right now, because I don't know what life will you have when you are a human. But anyway your life will differ from my devil life. I hope your life will be good. I hope that you will have good parents and you will grew up a good person.

Beatrix: So we will never see each-other after we will have parted?

Woman-devil: Listen to me. I don't think that we will have a possibility to meet each-other every day, but if you have some difficulties which are akin something irresolvable from your view-point you can conjure me for help. I will hear you.

Beatrix: Thank you, very much, Lady Devil! But I will miss you very much at least.

Woman-devil: I understand you very well. I will miss you, too, but there is nothing we could do to prevent our parting after which we will have the possibility to see each-other not so much as we would like. You will have to be a human and live among people and at the same time I will still have to live here out of the human world.

Beatrix: But why I will have to be a human and live separated from you?

Woman-devil: You were born a human. Do you remember about it?

Beatrix: Yes, I remember.

Woman-devil: So will have to continue life in human incarnation when the world does not need you in the incarnation of an extra-decomposer. But I must make a note that your upcoming life in human epitome does not have to be like your life before you were turned into an extra-decomposer. This life will be much more better because you will have full parents, not some alcoholics. Your future parents will be quite capable to give your full life.

Beatrix: I will miss Lilian, too. We were good friends during whole our life in this ocean.

Lilan: I will miss you, too. I will never forget you! It was remarkable to have time with you!

Beatrix: Lady Devil, will I have a possibility to see Lilian at least some times after I will have left this amazing world?

Woman-devil: I think, you will, but not very often, unfortunately. I hope you and I will have a possibility to meet each-other some time and so we will go to see Lilian.

Beatrix: Every time it will be difficult for me to wait such moments. I presume when I am a human I will not live in the ocean?

Woman-devil: Of course, you will not live in an ocean, aquarium or swamp. People can not breathe water like we or something else except air. By the way I would like to talk with you about your future life in human embodiment. You will live with adoptive parents. They will nurture you as if they were your natural parents: play with you, read you child narratives, buy you toys, clothes, child books and comics and anything what you will need. Also they will lead you in school, help you to study.

Beatrix: Anything of this is interesting, especially, what my adoptive parents will be.

Woman-devil: By the way, where is medusa?

Beatrix: He has floated without saying good by to us. I have never seen somebody of us: you, me or Lady Devil did so.

Lilian: I understand you, but, I think, unfortunately, Medusa is not so intelligent as we.

Woman-devil: I suggest not to reprobate him in this case where it is his own nature to be less intelligent than everybody of us and not to follow what is politically correct according to our vantage point. Now Lets take our every day working process related to refinement our marine nature in this water space.

Beatrix: But when you will tell me about my future life in embodiment and my new parents?

Woman-devil: After our today work. Now it's time to toil. I think you and also Lilian remember that a lot depends of us.

sharing_roles: 1. Timothy and may be somebody else
2. Snake and may be somebody else

Author's words: This morning Timothy came to the train station. There will be something unexpectable for him in the station, but he has not know about it yet.

Voice on the terminal: Do not be daunted by the snake. It is not a hazard for you.

Author's words: Timothy turned and saw that there is a big black snake creeping straight to him. He began silently watch in it. Timothy remembered that he had already seen this snake recently. He saw how this snake was creeping in bushes. When the snake had precipitated to him it began talk with him.

Snake: Hi, Timothy. Don't worry, please, I am not so scary.

Timothy: What do you want from me?

Snake: We must get acquainted and discuss something.

Timothy: I can understand nothing.

Snake: I want you to be pacified at first. You will understand enough soon. We must discuss very important question regarding your rights to adoption. I would like us to do this right now. There is one girl who needs parents.

Timothy: How it may be related to me?

Snake: Listen to me and you will understand everything. I know something about you and your family. Also I know one little girl who will need good parents soon. She does not have her native parents, but this girl is very nice and good. Now she is a little mermaid and lives in the Pacific ocean. It is close to your living place in San Salvador. She is not just a mermaid. Also she is an extra-decomposer. She was born a human, but there were tragic lamentable events in her life in result of which she died. After that I found her and turned into an extra-decomposer in mermaid likeness. Now we live in the Pacific ocean together close to the part of the bank where your living place is located. There will be no necessarity in extra-decomposers soon and I am going to turn the girl into a human. So she will need parents. We want you to take over the care of her.

Author's words: Of course, Timothy felt hard tumult after this meeting.

Timothy: Snake, may I be interested how can you speak like a human?

Snake: I am not a snake. I am a devil turned into a snake. I think people perceive me more frivolous in snake likeness than in my natural likeness.

Timothy: Are you sure? I am not.

Snake: Do you want to say me, that this imago is very unpleasant for you? What imago would be opportune for you then?

Timothy: I'm really sorry, snake, but frankly I don't like it very much, because it is a little scary. Please, don't opportune at me and don't bite me! You are very beautiful snake with brilliant things on your body! I like them! Moreover I beleive that you are very smart snake. I don't have objections to this likeness, you may be in it if you like it. But I have not gotten used to communicate with snakes and be close to them. So they are associated with hazard in my awareness. Sorry me, dear magic snake! What else - I know usually people don't like snakes and afraid them. So I am not sure that it isopportune view for you to communicate with people. But I will get used soon.

Snake: I know people don't like my natural view. So I decided to talk with you looking like a snake. I decided that it will be more opportune to talk with them in this view than in my natural view of Woman-devil. And because of I have conversation with such intelligent man as you I think it is not a wrong decision to talk to you choicing snake view. So, now we have to get close to the our topic. I would like to tell you about Beatrix, this girl whom I want you to adopt. And I would like to begin from the storie of her early childhood. Unfortunately, it is not very pleasing. I hope you will not object if I tell it right now.

Timothy: I am ready to hear.

Snake: All right. Fine. This girl was born a human. Her parents were not able to take carry of her and nurtur her fully because they were drunkards. So they did not care of Beatrix. They did not care about such questions as what she ate, did she wash or not and how she lived at all. She died from heavy illness. When she was ill, nobody noticed this and could help her with something. I found her dead in the street, turned her into a little cruise mermaid and revived her. Now we live in the ocean with different marine inhabitants. Beatrix is not a simple mermaid. She is an extra-scavenger. Did you hear about extra-scavengers?

Timothy: Yes, I read about them in magazines. It was very intresting. I wondered who they are and how they were created because as I know they have never been existed earlier in previous epoches. Can you tell exactly what was the reason of her demise? I mean what illness did Beatrix have and what was the reason for this illness.

Snake: Her kidney failured. It was summoned by wrong nutrition. There will be no demand in special scavengers soon. I am going to turn Beatrix into a human and I want you to adopt her.

Timothy: Yes, I can say, this is a harsh storie about Beatrix life. But I would like to concern why you choiced me as a candidate for adoption? And how do you know my name?

Snake: I remember I saw you once upon a time. I heard about you. It was when I creeped between bushes near your house. Then I heard your conversation with your acquaintances. I did not want to overhear it specifically, but it happened so. I just did not deep in my own thoughts and life and so it happened that I perceived about what you told with these people. I was concerned in this, because I wanted Beatrix to have adoptive parents after she will be turned into a human. I know you have an adult son who lives not with you and you would adopt an underage child. I heard about it. But it is not anything. I own feelings which tell me that you are very devout and noble person and I can apply to you for the help. It is your grander denomination to use to do good deals for people. It is beautiful that I and Beatrix have somebody to heip us so much. It is very well not only for us, but also for you.

Timothy: All right. I'll do it. I revere doing good deals.

Snake: Beatrix will be very thankfull to you.

Timothy: Tell me,  please, how do you think, will Beatrix be a good biddable child? I would like her to be so and unlike many of little mischievous naughty little kids.

Snake: I think, yes. As far as I know her, she is such kind of children. I like her as she is very much. I am sure she will not change negatively when she will be turned into a human being.

Timothy: Can you tell me about yourself? I am interested in this, too.

Snake: What exactly interests you? Me as a devil, or how I met Beatrix or what?

Timothy: I am interested in many things. But unfortunately now I have not very much time to listen everything. There must be a train very soon. Maybe this is not the most germane moment for me to talk with you on interesting themes, but it will be better for me to talk with you so much as I will have time to do this. It is better than just to wait the train keeping silence. Please, tell me about yourself as about a devil. Where are you from? Are you really from the hell?

Snake: All right. Yes, I am, but I assure you, not all the people find themselves in the hell after their demise. So you may be calm. Now I live in my Earth personalization in the Pacific ocean. I live in the side which is close to your living place.

Timothy: Oh! How cool!

Snake: Some people find disparity in me. They think that a devil means evil and it cannot be otherwise.

Author's words: Snake and Timothy heard that the train was expediting. Timothy turned back, looked at this train and after that he turned to the snake again.

Timothy: I am going. It is time to go to the train.

Snake: Good bye, Timothy. I wish you lucky trip!

Timothy: Thank you very much, Devil!

Snake: I am thankful to you also for your wonderful piousness! Good bye, Timothy!

Timothy: Good bye, Devil!

Author's words: Timothy turned and went. He came in the train and the door was closed after him.

Parts.header: Christian is going to San Salvador to continue his engagement

Author's words: Mr Jakins watched into Christian's room and saw that Christian had waken up. At this moment Christian was staying near his bed and put bedclothes off from the bed. Mr Jakins began speaking with his grandchild.

Christian's grandpa: Good morning, Christian. How was your sleeping?

Author's words: Christian turned to his grandpa.

Christian: My sleeping was fine, grandpa. Thanks.

Christian's grandpa: It is great. I am very glad. I have a few questions about your trip. As I understand you are going to go to carry out your contemplation regarding extra-decomposers. Am I right?

Christian: I can't say "carry out". I don't know how long my contemplation in this scientific area will be continuing. I can say that I am going to continue my contemplation. But I don't presume it will be finised soon.

Christian's grandpa: All right. I wish you to be lucky and I have a few questions else to you.

Christian: I am listening you.

Christian's grandpa: The first question is how long will your absence be lasting?

Christian: I can't say exactly. Sorry. It is not known yet.

Christian's grandpa: The second question is where are you going? I mean what country, what city.

Christian: I am going to San Salvador. It is a great place on the brink of the Pacific ocean. There is a fertility of different interesting extra-decomposers. Did I not told you and grandma about it?

Christian's grandpa: Maybe you did, but I am sorry, I forgot. How do you know that there is a fertility of different extra-decomposers in San Salvador?

Christian: Beatrix told me about it. Now she lives in Pacific ocean with Woman-devil and different other interesting creatures near this place.

Author's words: Christian and Mr Jakins heard voice of Mrs Jakins from outside of this room:

Christian's grandma: The breakfast is ready, boys. I am inviting you to the table.

Christian: (Turning to the exit of the room) Ok, grandma. We are going.

Christian's grandpa: Woman-devil?

Christian: Yes. This is such specific woman. She is a devil and in the same time she is somebody like a human. It turned out that she had created all these extra-decomposers to upheld ballance in nature.

Christian's grandpa: I have never heard about her earlier! How do you know about her?

Christian: Judy and Beatrix told me about her. Moreover, they met her personally. They like her. Beatrix posited that Woman-devil is quite good person.

Christian's grandpa: It is curious and very, very intresting.

Christian: It may be intresting for you, but it is not diserable to tell my grandma about it.
